item.title: [Python] MS Learn Recommended Learning Path February Issue [Introduction to AI]
item.description: ## MS Learning's first recommended learning path![Introduction to AI] MS Learn is a Microsoft learning platform. -Introduction to Machine Learning in Python and Azure Notebooks: Jupyter Notebooks running on Python and Azure Notebooks to predict patterns and identify trends. Learning Path to learn how to leverage the libraries associated with -Explain Machine Learning and Azure Data Science Virtual Machine: Azure Data, which is a pre-configured virtual machine service for performing data science tasks in Azure.
